content: Learning & Intelligent Systems Lab (LiSL) - Home Home People Learning Applications Publications Teaching Contact Welcome to Ohio University Learning & Intelligent Systems Lab (LiSL) Stocker Center Stocker Center Stocker Center Academic & Research Center (ARC) â¹ âº Ohio University Lenring & Intelligent Systems Lab (OU-LiSL) focuses on developing novel lerning solutions (machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, and neuromorphic computing) and applying them to various AI-related tasks. Ongoing projects include topics in autonomous robots and UAVs, neuromorphic computing, digital engineering, multi-sensor data fusion, and trustworthy generative AI.
